definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale

sentences.english: Is it not stange that most of us choose sucking rather than running?
sentences.chinese: 但我們大多寧肯吮吸卻不願奔流向前，這不奇怪嗎？

sentences.english: I extended my hands, and they tentatively suckled at my fingers.
sentences.chinese: 我伸出雙手，隨後它們試探性地吮吸着我的手指。

sentences.english: The flower plants suck to spin Is the gall of be elated.
sentences.chinese: 去吮吸那旋花植物令人心花怒放的毒汁。

sentences.english: I sucked the throaty thin woe of a rabbit
sentences.chinese: 我吮吸出一隻兔子的痛苦，嘶啞而細弱的痛苦。

sentences.english: A portion of the proboscis that is adapted as a sucking organ in many insects.
sentences.chinese: 吸喙許多昆蟲已改作吮吸喙官的一部分喙。

sentences.english: Everything is sucking and chewing and so on.
Then Beijing's sovereign wealth fund got suckered by Wall Street sharpies .
sentences.chinese: 北京主權財富基金被華爾街騙子吮吸。
他們疲倦的吮吸着小圓石。

sentences.english: On a wall-mounted menu: "Roasted sucking pigeon".
sentences.chinese: 還有一家餐廳牆上的菜單裏有“烤吮吸鴿”。

sentences.english: The ants keep sucking at them to obtain their honeydew - milking, you might call it.
sentences.chinese: 它們正在吮吸蚜蟲身上的蜜汁，也可以說他們在擠奶。

sentences.english: The bee that once did suck thee.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂曾經吮吸你的瓊漿。

sentences.english: We'd push our straws through the silver caps and suck.
sentences.chinese: 我們用吸管戳過銀色的薄瓶蓋慢慢吮吸。

sentences.english: When babies stay on a breast for too long, oxytocin production is disrupted.
sentences.chinese: 當嬰兒吮吸過久，後葉催產素的生成就會出現混亂。

sentences.english: Blogging and all the associated tasks can get addictive or turn into a time suck.
sentences.chinese: 博客和所有相關的任務可以得到上癮或變成吮吸時間。

sentences.english: Were we not weaned till then, But sucked on country pleasures, childishly ?
sentences.chinese: 莫非我們還沒斷奶，只知吮吸田園之樂像孩子一般？

sentences.english: It could interfere with the correct development of permanent teeth.
sentences.chinese: 吮吸拇指可能會妨礙恆牙的正常生長。

definition: to caress/to fondle/to look after (tenderly)/affectionate care
to suckle/to pump breast milk with a breast pump
milk from a woman's breast/milk (used in the names of dishes to indicate white sauce)
to gently caress and stroke/to pet/to fondle
